Michael Kors Ostrich-Embossed Satchel

It doesn’t sound very interesting, but you can’t judge a handbag by its name alone. Instead, focus on the completely classic beauty of this Michael Kors Rectangular Flap Shoulder Bag. Almost regal in its simple elegance, it’s the kind of thing you might spot on the arm of Duchess Kate. The clean lines and demure gold hardware set it apart from the rest; while the details are incredibly understated, they work together to make the bag an absolute standout.
Mr. All-American himself is a master of all things classic, but michael michael kors tote also capitalizes on seasonal trends with incredible precision and grace. Here, his Quinn Leather Envelope Clutch offers women a quietly elegant take on minimalist chic. It’s a smart addition to a season otherwise rife with gaudy materials and brighter-than-usual colors, and makes a wonderful complement to everything from office holiday party attire to take-me-seriously lunch meetings with the higher-ups. Sleek and simple, it carries only what you need without adding any unnecessary bulk to your look.
I’m glad michael kors hamilton didn’t go too literal with his Michael by Michael Kors Zebra Stripe Canvas Tote. In full blown zebra print, this bag would have been way too cheesy. Instead, we get a thin, unpredictable white stripe that is perhaps even a little more realistic than the cartoonish animal print we’ve become used to. This high contrast bag is a mature and responsible alternative to crazier print purses, and would even be suited for the office.
We’ve reviewed a number of Michael Kors Skorpios bags over the years, but it’s safe to say none of them have been as striking as this. New for fall, the Skorpios Large Croc-Embossed Leather Tote is awash in a gorgeous shade of rich plum that appears to have a sort of ombré color effect going on. The result is gorgeous: dramatic, deep, smoldering and sexy, with just a touch of gold hardware adding a gleaming finish to an already amazing bag.

Michael Kors Satchel and Satchel Handbags

The michael michael kors tote is the perfect example of a women’s everyday handbag. In the family of Michal Kors handbags the satchel is the one that might just have the most functionality. Most of them feature two medium straps that come up over the top of the bag. They also feature a wide range of gold or silver tone accents and studs. The collection is very dynamic in the sense that there are tons of different colors, styles and materials offered. The Michael Kors Satchel collection has handbags that are great for going out at night or to carry around every day. The satchel bags can range from $300 all the way up to $3, 000 retail. Here are some descriptions of the popular styles of satchels.

The michael kors hamilton Uptown Astor Satchel comes in an assortment of colored leather. The colors available are Black, Amethyst, Vanilla, Lapis and luggage brown. They feature a zip top to keep all items contained safe and secure. The satchels have gold toned studs accenting them with top handles and rings. They also feature a logo charm.

The first thing to be aware of is the massive market out there for fake handbags. Just take a walk down Canal Street in New york city and you will be bombarded with people trying to sell you fake bag or knock offs. If you want the real deal, something to be proud of then you need to learn how to spot a fake Michael Kors Handbag. One major give away is the spelling of his name on the product. Some common misspellings include Michael Koors, Michael Khors, Michael Cors, Michael Korrs and even Micheal Kors. These spelling errors are easily overlooked with a quick glance of the eye. Be sure to spend your hard earned money at a reputable Michael Kors distributor.

One of the higher end satchels is the Michael Kors Rehearsal Python Satchel. This leather bag comes in Merlot, Black and Bark colors. The bag has gold tone hardware and shoulder straps with square rings. It features a buckle flap enclosure with logo engraving. The satchel has a slight pleat and a braided tassel detail on the sides.
